scripts.install-all: composer install --no-scripts --no-interaction && npm install && cd embedding_service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install-all-linux: composer install --no-scripts --no-interaction && npm install && bash install-linux.sh
scripts.install-all-linux-local: composer install --no-scripts --no-interaction && npm install && bash install-linux-local.sh
scripts.serve-all: concurrently "php artisan serve" "cd embedding_service && uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8180 --reload"
scripts.serve-all-linux: concurrently -k -n PHP,UVICORN -c yellow,cyan "php artisan serve" "cd embedding_service && ./myenv/bin/uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8180"
scripts.serve-all-linux-dev: concurrently -k -n PHP,UVICORN -c yellow,cyan "php artisan serve" "cd embedding_service && ./myenv/bin/uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8180 --reload"
